NATIONAL ASSOCIATION OF EDUCATIONAL BROADCASTERS
OFFICE OF THE PRESIDENT
Station KUOM
University of Minnesota
Minneapolis 14, Minnesota
April 9, 1958
Dr. Sam L. Becker
Television Center
State University of Iowa
Iowa City, Iowa
Dear Sam:
I have discussed with Harry Skornia the matter
of the chairmanship of the Research Committee. We
both feel very strongly that you should continue
as chairman. So, unless I hear from you to the
contrary, 1*11 continue to list you in that capacity.
As a matter of fact, from your vantage point
in New York you may be able to think of and do
something for us you couldn't do from Iowa City!
Best of luck with your plans for next year.
Yours sincerely,
Burton Paulu
President
BP:ds
cc: Harry Skornia
